mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, repair_id AS repairId, repair_content as repairContent, date_format(repair_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as repairTime, repair_state as repairState FROM t_property_repair where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT repair_id AS repairId, repair_address AS repairAddress, repair_name AS repairName, date_format(repair_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS repairTime, repair_content AS repairContent, repair_phone AS repairPhone, repairPicture1 AS repairPicture from t_property_repair where repair_id = #{repairId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
